problem.display_name: Graded question- Data Set Design - Question 1

multiplechoiceresponse.label: What is one method we can use to control which data elements can have data entered in them that is not available on a paper/source form? (2 attempts)

div.p: Grey cells can be used to easily block data elements or disaggregations from being entered. Validation rules can be used to check data, but can not be used to block a single data element from being entered. Section forms are a type of form we can make, they do not control what can be entered
